titleStmt.title: Tēs pisteōs elegchos, or, The reason of faith briefly discuss'd in a sermon, preach'd at Pauls before the Right Honourable, the Lord Mayor, &c., the third of October, 1658, and publish'd by the order of his lordship, and Court of Aldermen / by Peter Vinke ...
titleStmt.author: Timoreus, Theophilus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.M. for Ralph Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: First three words of title in Greek characters.
Attributed by Wing to Richard Vines, who wrote under the pseudonym of Timoreus.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
